Reviews.Title: “Classic hotel in heart of Zona Rosa”
Reviews.Author: mooshimom
Reviews.Content: hotel avenida londres beautiful lobby memorabilia displays helpful concierge staff spacious beautiful dark spanish style furniture marble bathroom lovely linens floor ceiling windows handsome draperies wifi interior quiet reasonable price 100 nite including taxes close metro lots restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Good, safe, comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: DrPJCR
Reviews.Content: id stayed hotel dozen times 5 located middle zona rosa nice mexico city lot restaurants shops nearby police station 20 steps 4 5 cop cars outside hotel 4 diamond restaurant called corner watch people clean comfortable staff helpful free internet hotel sometimes depending reservation free breakfast restaurant simple mornings serve kinds bread eggs beans chilaquiles pancakes waffles yogurt fruit biggest secrets hotel outside tourist taxi drivers mexico carlos hes helpful improve visits mexico consider visit zona rosa mexicos neighborhood sexual diversity lot people surprised night parking lot inside hotel free gym pool rooftop cold overall hotel fancy cheap

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, not great.”
Reviews.Author: 1norcalman
Reviews.Content: mexico city week vacation booked western royal zona hotel competing website price excellent reviews favorable overall ok stay staff friendly helpful clean wifi fast dependable neighborhood eclectic excellent restaurants shopping block seedy sex shops street police station half block police constantly street night safe walking dinner shopping marriott intercontinental western bit makeover beds pillows uncomfortable ive encountered hotel travel extensively throughout mexico hard beds worst air conditioning properly windows dont warm stuffy street noisy horns honking traffic gap window frame building noise carpets stained replacement days towels soft fluffy days thread bare bargain rate stay 50 night probably worth look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hotel for couples ok if u r a backpacker”
Reviews.Author: swansrock
Reviews.Content: staff extremely rude happy possibly pay upgrade offered upgrade penthouse suite paying total night western help checked 1 night meant 4 night stay sights mexico city atmosphere beds hard rocks pillows bed soft recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location, quality and service”
Reviews.Author: Mada2010
Reviews.Content: stayed night march cancun playa del carmen write information location base city tour hotel clean nice bathrooms breakfast tasty various dishes available staff friendly helpfull ph nice terrace top building wih swimming pool found negative hotel

Reviews.Title: “great value, good location”
Reviews.Author: gfxetal
Reviews.Content: upscale pretentious clean efficient rooftop bar heated pool relaxing day sightseeing business temperature little cool didnt respond heat controls plumbing lights tv etc quality linens comfortable traveler unwind

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, central, clean, nice staff”
Reviews.Author: LindaAyleenGermany
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel view city neighbourhood nice spacious equiped beds comfortable hard matress definately recommend hotel complains breakfast eggs yoghurt toast fresh fruit coffee juice beans etc

Reviews.Title: “Some room for improvement”
Reviews.Author: CesarioLosAngeles
Reviews.Content: reasonably priced hotel middle zona rosa location lots shops restaurants etc nearby dont expect luxury extras hotel basics complaints service training front desk intentions professional attention detail international travelers expect hotel df mistakes checking mistake middle stay keycard kept failing reason little unnerved stay pity experience

Reviews.Title: “A HORRIBLE HOLIDAY WHICH I THOUGHT I WOULD GO TO RELAX”
Reviews.Author: yahoohere
Reviews.Content: hotel marvelous hotel bed sheets changed smell fine found cockroaches bath tub turd outstanding pool mother couldnt catch breath called vacation relax wont goin advise else

Reviews.Content: tour operator selected hotel happy hotel located clubby partying nearby night significant police presence reassured happen electronic key single time door phobia doors time elevator lobby reset reception staff professional overwhelmed dont care breakfast similar hotels mexico city overall service poor location choice hotels quality cheaper business center internet enabled pcs closed weekends
